song_name: The Less I Know the Better
metrics_conclusion: The Less I Know the Better has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: The Less I Know the Better has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Major,  and E Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
